I've had this for almost a month now and used in twice in that duration. So take my comments with a grain of salt.

I think the product is great! It definitely helped style and hold my curls. I was a bit confused at first on how to get the gel cast off my hair once it dried (I just recently got into hair care), but once I figured it out, my hair turned out so nice. I love that for the amount we paid, we get so much of the product, so it's worth it in my opinion.

The packaging is a little bit messy though. Since the product is a little more on the liquid-y side, it's a bit hard not to make a mess with the cap as its opening. It's a little bit hard to control the amount of product I'll get, so sometimes I end up wasting a bit. I kinda wish they'll replace the cap with a pump instead.

i have extremely frizzy hair na sirang sira ang curl pattern bc of genetics, years of rebond and not knowing how to style/care for it. i wanted my hair to be as bagsak as it possibly can because it gets way too poofy thru out the day. and unfortunately for me, hindi masyadong nagtagal yun, it's more creme than gel in my exp. 

my routine for wearing it was leave-in conditioner on damp hair then this product, skipped the gel this time (which is usually the last step for me). i'll be adding gel after applying this from now on.

still, its SO MUCH better and cost efficient than other, usually more expensive and imported curl cream. for those na talagang kulot, frizzy and hindi defined ang texture, need pa siguro ng extra hold, i recommend using a gel after this. pero sa mga wavy texture and overall relatively defined na ang curl pattern, i really recommend this!
